fr:mainmatter.fr:p: We present introductory material on cryptography and category theory, focused on the prerequisites to cryptographic composability. We then present the approach to cryptographic composability of Broadbent & Karvonen. We give several novel contributions, including a new model for cryptographic protocols which use both single- and multi-use resources, and a 2-categorical generalization of their model which incorporates data about computational reductions.
